attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament as soon as all revelations about Members expenses have been published
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming ever more apparent that the Members of the House of Commons are a morally bankrupt group, intent more on milking the expenses system rather than representing their consituencies.
I believe the public should have the right to be able to make an immediate choice about their current Member of Parliament, discarding him or her if wished, based upon the still to be published disclosure of their expense claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
